ch0216_00_minaki/0101_0701_01_10:
Yo, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Glad to see you
again today.
ch0216_00_minaki/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s run across Pasio together and make
some refreshing, beautiful memories!
ch0216_00_minaki/7101_0701_01_10:
If you’re going to have dreams and goals, then
go big!
ch0216_00_minaki/7101_0701_02_10: Even if it’s huge and seems difficult...
ch0216_00_minaki/7101_0701_03_10:
the fun times you spend chasing it with all your
heart are priceless.
ch0216_00_minaki/7102_0701_01_10:
Suicune is a Legendary Pokémon I was
chasing for a long time.
ch0216_00_minaki/7102_0701_02_10: Of course, I’m happy it’s now by my side, but...
ch0216_00_minaki/7102_0701_03_10:
At the same time, it’s hard to believe this is real.
It feels like a dream.
ch0216_00_minaki/7103_0701_01_10:
My friend from Johto has been training day and
night on Pasio. It seems every day has been
fulfilling for him.
ch0216_00_minaki/7103_0701_02_10:
That could be because he’s surrounded by
good people and Pokémon, but...
ch0216_00_minaki/7103_0701_03_10: I can tell he’s gotten a lot stronger!
ch0216_00_minaki/7104_0701_01_10: When I was searching for Suicune in Johto...
ch0216_00_minaki/7104_0701_02_10:
I had a rival I competed with to see who could
earn Suicune’s respect first.
ch0216_00_minaki/7104_0701_03_10: A rival to chase dreams alongside...
ch0216_00_minaki/7104_0701_04_10:
If there’s someone like that in your life as well,
make sure you’re a good friend to them!
ch0216_00_minaki/7105_0701_01_10:
When I was chasing after Suicune, I was always
looking toward the future.
ch0216_00_minaki/7105_0701_02_10:
But maybe now’s a good time to stop, take a
moment, and look back.
ch0216_00_minaki/7105_0701_03_10:
I’d like to find what I might’ve missed along
the way.
ch0216_00_minaki/1701_0701_01_10:
I’d like to give you a gift for always being such
a go-getter!
ch0216_00_minaki/1701_0702_01_10: It should help you as you race along at full speed!
ch0216_00_minaki/2501_0701_01_10:
I believe dreams and aspirations are what
motivate and inspire people.
ch0216_00_minaki/2501_0701_02_10:
And people shine brightest when they act on
their dreams!
ch0216_00_minaki/2501_0702_01_10:
Even if your dreams come true, the story doesn’t
end there.
ch0216_00_minaki/2501_0702_02_10: That’s when it’s time to chase a new dream!
ch0216_00_minaki/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m an old friend of Morty, a Trainer who uses
Ghost-type Pokémon.
ch0216_00_minaki/2511_0701_02_10:
He trained for a long time because he wanted to
earn the respect of a certain Legendary Pokémon.
ch0216_00_minaki/2511_0701_03_10:
When we reunited on Pasio, I heard he’d finally
achieved his dream. I was so happy, it was like
I’d achieved a dream of my own!
ch0216_00_minaki/2511_0702_01_10: Hard work doesn’t always pay off.
ch0216_00_minaki/2511_0702_02_10:
However! I find it admirable when someone chases
their dreams!
ch0216_00_minaki/2511_0702_03_10: I’m confident the time and hard work isn’t wasted!
ch0216_00_minaki/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! As usual, let’s race toward any
new goals we have today!
ch0216_00_minaki/3003_0701_01_10:
When you’re tired, it’s OK to take a little break.
Doing so allows you to run at full speed again.
ch0216_00_minaki/3005_0701_01_10:
When I see the moon reflected in a body of water,
my heart feels clear and pure.
